email.subject: The Cage
email.body:
Hi, I'm Lilly.
Thank you so much for playing this extension and thanks again for being patient and enjoying the ride til' here, also I want to thanks again a lot for the creators of the pictures, songs and more that helped made the cage a really nice extension.
I don't know the true authors of the themes since i've found so many in google that I don't know which one is the real one.
Dan Terminus: https://dan-terminus.bandcamp.com/
Carpenter Brut: https://carpenterbrut.bandcamp.com/
Alex, Tokyo Rose: https://newretrowave.bandcamp.com/album/akuma
Vogel: https://vogelmusic.bandcamp.com/album/imperivm
Roborg: https://roborg.bandcamp.com/
Sequencer-exe: https://soundcloud.com/sequencer-exe
Oh, and if you really enjoyed this extension I have great news for you, I'm working now on the second part of this extension, it may take a while since I've ran out of ideas, but I'll do my best as I did with this one.
Thanks for playing!
